description: Chicken thighs are meltingly tender in this delicious, smoked paprika scented stew.
name: Mediterranean Chicken & Olive Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 chicken thighs, skin on, bone in
3 large capsicums, red and green, chopped
1.6 cup chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the chicken thighs for 4-5 minutes to brown all over. Remove with a slotted spoon and tip into the slow cooker. Cook the onions for 5 minutes, add the garlic and cook for 1 minute then tip into the slow cooker.

Pour the wine into the pan and cook for 1 minute, add the stock and whisk in the tomato paste and bring to the boil. Add the capsicums, smoked paprika and olives to the slow cooker, pour over the stock mix and cook on high for 4 hours.
Add the capsicums, smoked paprika and olives to the slow cooker, pour over the stock mix and cook on high for 4 hours.
